descript.abstract: Current buildings feature class used by Lancaster County. This dataset consists of polygons representing footprints for any building that is approximately 100 square feet or greater.
descript.purpose: The buildings feature class is a photogrammetric update to the existing building footprint feature class maintained by Lancaster County. Features were updated using NGA and USGS 30 centimeter aerial photos flown from March 26th through April 3rd, 2012 that encompass the entire County. Red-Green-Blue and Color Infrared were both used to capture, modify, and validate new and changed features. Buildings greater than or equal to 100 square feet were updated in Lancaster City and buildings greater than or equal to 400 square feet were updated in the rest of Lancaster County.
